name: places/ChIJZdivdLlYwokR5qUCQkfIeuI
adrFormatAddress: 1576 1st Ave., New York, NY 10028-4004, USA

originalText.text: Absolute trash store with “I don’t care about you” customer service. It’s also dirty and gross. There are other places in the neighborhood.

text.text: Absolute trash store with “I don’t care about you” customer service. It’s also dirty and gross. There are other places in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: I stopped by to pick up a sandwich, but I was pleasantly surprised by the variety of flowers and bouquets. I decided to buy some and they were very fresh and lasted a long time. Will come back for more flowers!

text.text: I stopped by to pick up a sandwich, but I was pleasantly surprised by the variety of flowers and bouquets. I decided to buy some and they were very fresh and lasted a long time. Will come back for more flowers!

originalText.text: If I could give less I would- Horrible horrible customer service . I bought a few things from there but one of the items I found to be cheaper somewhere else so I came back the next day to see if I could return it . It was a sealed container and I ask politely if I could return it, the cashier asked me if something was wrong with it and I said no just that I found it cheaper somewhere else . She got so mad at me and started yelling and slammed the money on the counter continuing raise her voice and insult me. I wasn’t rude and a simple no we don’t do returns would have been enough. Will never come back to shop here and would highly not recommend!

text.text: If I could give less I would- Horrible horrible customer service . Will never come back to shop here and would highly not recommend!

originalText.text: Was there last night with the wife around 11pm.  There was one worker in the front, one in the back and no one wanted to help me. I waited 10 minutes to see if anyone would ask what I needed and they never did.  When I asked one of the guys to help me out he didn't want to because he said he was eating, so then I asked the other guy and he said he couldn't because he had to stay up front. So how exactly does that work? I have lived 2 blocks away from this deli for almost 7 years now and was extremely disgusted with last night and WILL NEVER GO BACK!  I suggest you all do the same. (Zero stars if possible)

originalText.text: Nice place..they have everything..including hot and cold food.
